actions.text: Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for limited continuation of pay of clerical assistants to Members of the House in certain cases of termination of service of such Members.

summary.text: Provides for the continuation of pay of clerical assistants to Members of the House of Representatives who terminate their terms of office, as if such termination were by death or resignation, until otherwise provided by law.

titles.title: A resolution providing for limited continuation of pay of clerical assistants to Members of the House in certain cases of termination of service of such Members.
